Changelog

-- Version 1.0.4
Playlist Stats: Added tracking and display of shuffled playlists, tracks, and songs

-- Version 1.0.3
Stay Signed In: Implemented token refresh to maintain user sessions.
UI Enhancements: Improved design with TailwindCSS.
Shuffle Improvements: Added rate limiting and retry logic.
Token Handling Fixes: Resolved issues with authentication flow.

-- Version 1.0.2
Playlist Management: Users can view and manage playlists.
OAuth Authentication: Enhanced secure access with Spotify's OAuth.

-- Version 1.0.1
Customizable Interface: Introduced TailwindCSS for better UX.
Error Handling: Improved network request reliability.

-- Version 1.0.0
Initial Release: Launched Spotify Shuffler for playlist shuffling.
